gurmukhi: bwlk iksor jobnwid Aau jrw ibvsQw eyk hI jnm hoq Aink pRkwr hY
transliteration: Baalak Kisor Jobanaadi Au Jaraa Bivasadaa , Ayk Hee Janam Hot Anik Prakaar Hai ?
translation: Just as one go through childhood, adolescence, youth and old age in one lifespan.

gurmukhi: jYsy inis idin iqiQ vwr pC mwsu ruiq cqur mwsw qiRibiD brK ibQwr hY
transliteration: Jaisay Nisi Dini Tidi Vaar Pachh Maasu Routi , Chatur Maasaa Tribidhi Barakh Bidaar Hai ?
translation: As days, nights, dates, weeks, months, four seasons are the spread of one year;

gurmukhi: jwgq supn Aau sKopiq AvsQw kY qurIAw pRgws gur igAwn aupkwr hY
transliteration: Jaagat Soupan Au Sakhopati Avasadaa Kai , Tureeaa Pragaas Gur Giaan Oupakaar Hai ?
translation: As wakefulness, dream sleep, deep slumber and a state of nothingness (Turi) are different states;

gurmukhi: mwns jnm swDsMg imil swD sMq Bgq ibbykI jn bHm bIcwr hY ]159]
transliteration: Maanas Janam Saadhasang Mili Saadh Santa , Bhagat Bibaykee Jan Braham Beechaar Hai ?159?
translation: Similarly meeting with saintly people and contemplating on Lord's glory and grandeur during human life, one becomes a godly person, a saint, a devotee and a wise man. (159)
